headline: Peter Zaffino to Transition to Executive Chair of AIG‚Äôs Board of Directors by Mid-2026
summary: NEW YORK, January 06, 2026--American International Group, Inc. (NYSE: AIG) today announced that Chairman & CEO Peter Zaffino has informed the AIG Board of Directors that he intends to transition to Executive Chair of AIG and retire as CEO by mid-year after successfully leading the company‚Äôs transformation and strategic repositioning as a leading global property and casualty insurer.

headline: Almonty Appoints Veteran Financial Executive Guillaume Wiesenbach de Lamaziere, CFA as Chief Development Officer
summary: TORONTO, January 06, 2026--Almonty Industries Inc. ("Almonty" or the "Company") (NASDAQ: ALM) (TSX: AII) (ASX: AII) (Frankfurt: ALI1), a leading global producer of tungsten, today announced the appointment of Guillaume Wiesenbach de Lamaziere, CFA as Chief Development Officer to spearhead key corporate development strategy and execution.

content.title: Almonty Appoints Veteran Financial Executive Guillaume Wiesenbach de Lamaziere, CFA as Chief Development Officer
content.summary: TORONTO, January 06, 2026--Almonty Industries Inc. ("Almonty" or the "Company") (NASDAQ: ALM) (TSX: AII) (ASX: AII) (Frankfurt: ALI1), a leading global producer of tungsten, today announced the appointment of Guillaume Wiesenbach de Lamaziere, CFA as Chief Development Officer to spearhead key corporate development strategy and execution.

headline: AIG‚Äôs Peter Zaffino to Retire as CEO
summary: American International Group‚Äôs chairman and chief executive, Peter Zaffino, plans to retire as chief executive midyear and will hand the reins to longtime Aon executive Eric Andersen.

content.title: AIG‚Äôs Peter Zaffino to Retire as CEO
content.summary: American International Group‚Äôs chairman and chief executive, Peter Zaffino, plans to retire as chief executive midyear and will hand the reins to longtime Aon executive Eric Andersen.

headline: AIG‚Äôs CEO Is  Stepping Down. The Insurance Stock Is Falling.
summary: Peter Zaffino is retiring as CEO of  American International Group  with longtime  Aon  executive Eric Andersen taking the reins at the property and casualty insurer.  AIG said Zaffino, who has led the company since 2021, will transition to executive chair and leave his post as chief executive by mid-year.

content.title: AIG‚Äôs CEO Is  Stepping Down. The Insurance Stock Is Falling.
content.summary: Peter Zaffino is retiring as CEO of  American International Group  with longtime  Aon  executive Eric Andersen taking the reins at the property and casualty insurer.  AIG said Zaffino, who has led the company since 2021, will transition to executive chair and leave his post as chief executive by mid-year.

headline: AIG CEO to step down in June, Ford posts strong Q4 sales
summary: Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman and Yahoo Finance markets and data editor Jared Blikre track several of the day's top trending stock tickers, including American International Group (AIG) CEO Peter Zaffino announcing his plans to step down this June, Microchip Technology's (MCHP) preliminary earnings results pointing to a recovery in sales, and Ford (F) reporting strong fourth quarter sales figures. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: AIG‚Äôs Peter Zaffino to Step Down as CEO
summary: Peter Zaffino  is stepping down as chief executive of American International Group after a turbulent period at the insurer that culminated in  AIG  insisting it wasn‚Äôt for sale.  The change caps months of C-suite turmoil for AIG, which in November abruptly scrapped plans to bring in another executive,  John Neal,  as Zaffino‚Äôs heir-apparent.  The reversal, two weeks before Neal was due to start, was triggered by AIG‚Äôs discovery that Neal‚Äôs previous employer was investigating an alleged workplace affair.

headline: Why AIG (AIG) Shares Are Getting Obliterated Today
summary: Shares of global insurance giant AIG (NYSE:AIG) fell 6.9% in the afternoon session after the company announced that its Chairman and CEO, Peter Zaffino, planned to retire as CEO by mid-year. Zaffino informed the Board of Directors of his intent to transition to the role of Executive Chair. The insurance giant revealed that Eric Andersen, an industry veteran from Aon, would join as President and CEO-elect on February 16, 2026. Andersen was expected to take over the CEO role after June 1, 2026, fo
